Comments_List: learned how to do mass balances and how to think more critically
The way to set up the mass balance in every processes
Consolidate the mass balance concept in different engineering systems.
I developed knowledge about the processes of water treatment and the principles of chemistry/biology behind these processes.
aligned very well- learned a lot
It gave me more insight than I expected.
They aligned fairly well although I expected that there might be some more coverage of water treatment methods in developing countries.
This class surpassed my expectations, the professor is amazing.
strengths: taught at a good pace
The professor explains the problems very careful.
The amount of material covered was appropriate for the length of the class and the homeworks did a good job of reviewing all material. Students would benefit from a homework on the last section.
go to office hours if you are confused and stick with it, it can be challenging but worth it

The course is most valuable if you are really interested in working in the water quality/water treatment sector in the future, but it is still cool to learn some of the processes behind various water quality issues. TA sessions really help for understanding the material better.
